trans-unit.source: Convert ink strokes to text using handwriting recognition, or to shapes using custom recognition.
trans-unit.target: Convert ink strokes to text using handwriting recognition, or to shapes using custom recognition.

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: Convert ink strokes to text using handwriting recognition, or to shapes using custom recognition.
trans-unit.target: Convert ink strokes to text using handwriting recognition, or to shapes using custom recognition.

trans-unit.source: Handwriting recognition is built in to the Windows ink platform, and supports an extensive set of locales and languages.
trans-unit.target: Handwriting recognition is built in to the Windows ink platform, and supports an extensive set of locales and languages.

trans-unit.source: For all examples here, add the namespace references required for ink functionality.
trans-unit.target: For all examples here, add the namespace references required for ink functionality.

trans-unit.source: Here, we demonstrate how to use the handwriting recognition engine, associated with the default installed language pack, to interpret a set of strokes on an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).
trans-unit.target: Here, we demonstrate how to use the handwriting recognition engine, associated with the default installed language pack, to interpret a set of strokes on an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535).

trans-unit.source: The recognition is initiated by the user clicking a button when they are finished writing.
trans-unit.target: The recognition is initiated by the user clicking a button when they are finished writing.

trans-unit.source: First, we set up the UI.
trans-unit.target: First, we set up the UI.

trans-unit.source: The UI includes a "Recognize" button, the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), and an area to display recognition results.
trans-unit.target: The UI includes a "Recognize" button, the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), and an area to display recognition results.

trans-unit.source: We then set some basic ink input behaviors.
trans-unit.target: We then set some basic ink input behaviors.

trans-unit.source: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)).
trans-unit.target: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)).

trans-unit.source: Ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).
trans-unit.target: Ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).

trans-unit.source: A listener for the click event on the "Recognize" button is also declared.
trans-unit.target: A listener for the click event on the "Recognize" button is also declared.

trans-unit.source: Finally, we perform the basic handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: Finally, we perform the basic handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: For this example, we use the click event handler of the "Recognize" button to perform the handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we use the click event handler of the "Recognize" button to perform the handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.
trans-unit.target: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.

trans-unit.source: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.
trans-unit.target: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.

trans-unit.source: A comprehensive subset of languages supported by Windows can be used for handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: A comprehensive subset of languages supported by Windows can be used for handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the languages supported by the [**InkRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208478).
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the languages supported by the [**InkRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208478).

trans-unit.source: The first column contains the possible values for [**Name**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208484).
trans-unit.target: The first column contains the possible values for [**Name**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208484).

trans-unit.source: English in the U.S. and the Philippines
trans-unit.target: English in the U.S. and the Philippines

trans-unit.source: English in Great Britain, and all other locations not specified in this table
trans-unit.target: English in Great Britain, and all other locations not specified in this table

trans-unit.source: German in Germany, Austria, Luxembourg, and Namibia
trans-unit.target: German in Germany, Austria, Luxembourg, and Namibia

trans-unit.source: Reconocimiento de escritura a mano en español de Microsoft
trans-unit.target: Reconocimiento de escritura a mano en español de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Spanish in Spain, and all other locations not specified in this table
trans-unit.target: Spanish in Spain, and all other locations not specified in this table

trans-unit.source: Reconocedor de escritura en Español (México) de Microsoft
trans-unit.target: Reconocedor de escritura en Español (México) de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Spanish in Mexico and the United States
trans-unit.target: Spanish in Mexico and the United States

trans-unit.source: Reconocedor de escritura en Español (Argentina) de Microsoft
trans-unit.target: Reconocedor de escritura en Español (Argentina) de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Spanish in Argentina, Paraguay, and Uruguay
trans-unit.target: Spanish in Argentina, Paraguay, and Uruguay

trans-unit.source: French in France, Canada, Belgium, Switzerland, and all other locations
trans-unit.target: French in France, Canada, Belgium, Switzerland, and all other locations

trans-unit.source: Microsoft 日本語手書き認識エンジン
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 日本語手書き認識エンジン

trans-unit.source: Italian in Italy, Switzerland, and all other locations
trans-unit.target: Italian in Italy, Switzerland, and all other locations

trans-unit.source: Dutch in the Netherlands, Surinam, and the Antilles
trans-unit.target: Dutch in the Netherlands, Surinam, and the Antilles

trans-unit.source: Microsoft 中文(简体)手写识别器
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 中文(简体)手写识别器

trans-unit.source: Microsoft 中文(繁體)手寫辨識器
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 中文(繁體)手寫辨識器

trans-unit.source: Microsoft система распознавания русского рукописного ввода
trans-unit.target: Microsoft система распознавания русского рукописного ввода

trans-unit.source: Reconhecedor de Manuscrito da Microsoft para Português (Brasil)
trans-unit.target: Reconhecedor de Manuscrito da Microsoft para Português (Brasil)

trans-unit.source: Reconhecedor de escrita manual da Microsoft para português
trans-unit.target: Reconhecedor de escrita manual da Microsoft para português

trans-unit.source: Portuguese in Portugal, and all other locations
trans-unit.target: Portuguese in Portugal, and all other locations

trans-unit.source: System rozpoznawania polskiego pisma odręcznego firmy Microsoft
trans-unit.target: System rozpoznawania polskiego pisma odręcznego firmy Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Microsoft rozpoznávač rukopisu pro český jazyk
trans-unit.target: Microsoft rozpoznávač rukopisu pro český jazyk

trans-unit.source: Serbian, in Latin, in all locations
trans-unit.target: Serbian, in Latin, in all locations

trans-unit.source: Serbian, in Cyrillic, in all locations
trans-unit.target: Serbian, in Cyrillic, in all locations

trans-unit.source: Reconeixedor d'escriptura manual en català de Microsoft
trans-unit.target: Reconeixedor d'escriptura manual en català de Microsoft

trans-unit.source: Your app can query the set of installed handwriting recognition engines and use one of those or let a user select their preferred language.
trans-unit.target: Your app can query the set of installed handwriting recognition engines and use one of those or let a user select their preferred language.

trans-unit.source: Users can see a list of installed languages by going to Settings -> Time & Language.
trans-unit.target: Users can see a list of installed languages by going to Settings -> Time & Language.

trans-unit.source: Installed languages are listed under Languages.
trans-unit.target: Installed languages are listed under Languages.

trans-unit.source: To install new language packs and enable handwriting recognition for that language:
trans-unit.target: To install new language packs and enable handwriting recognition for that language:

trans-unit.source: Go to **Settings > Time & language > Region & language**.
trans-unit.target: Go to **Settings > Time & language > Region & language**.

trans-unit.source: Select a language from the list, then choose the region version.
trans-unit.target: Select a language from the list, then choose the region version.

trans-unit.source: The language is now listed on the **Region & language** page.
trans-unit.target: The language is now listed on the **Region & language** page.

trans-unit.source: On the **Language options** page, download the **Handwriting recognition engine** (they can also download the full language pack, speech recognition engine, and keyboard layout here).
trans-unit.target: On the **Language options** page, download the **Handwriting recognition engine** (they can also download the full language pack, speech recognition engine, and keyboard layout here).

trans-unit.source: Here, we demonstrate how to use the handwriting recognition engine to interpret a set of strokes on an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) based on the selected recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Here, we demonstrate how to use the handwriting recognition engine to interpret a set of strokes on an [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) based on the selected recognizer.

trans-unit.source: The recognition is initiated by the user clicking a button when they are finished writing.
trans-unit.target: The recognition is initiated by the user clicking a button when they are finished writing.

trans-unit.source: First, we set up the UI.
trans-unit.target: First, we set up the UI.

trans-unit.source: The UI includes a "Recognize" button, a combo box that lists all installed handwriting recognizers, the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), and an area to display recognition results.
trans-unit.target: The UI includes a "Recognize" button, a combo box that lists all installed handwriting recognizers, the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535), and an area to display recognition results.

trans-unit.source: We then set some basic ink input behaviors.
trans-unit.target: We then set some basic ink input behaviors.

trans-unit.source: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)).
trans-unit.target: The [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)).

trans-unit.source: Ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).
trans-unit.target: Ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).

trans-unit.source: We call an `InitializeRecognizerList` function to populate the recognizer combo box with a list of installed handwriting recognizers.
trans-unit.target: We call an `InitializeRecognizerList` function to populate the recognizer combo box with a list of installed handwriting recognizers.

trans-unit.source: We also declare listeners for the click event on the "Recognize" button and the selection changed event on the recognizer combo box.
trans-unit.target: We also declare listeners for the click event on the "Recognize" button and the selection changed event on the recognizer combo box.

trans-unit.source: We populate the recognizer combo box with a list of installed handwriting recognizers.
trans-unit.target: We populate the recognizer combo box with a list of installed handwriting recognizers.

trans-unit.source: An [**InkRecognizerContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208479) is created to manage the handwriting recognition process.
trans-unit.target: An [**InkRecognizerContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208479) is created to manage the handwriting recognition process.

trans-unit.source: Use this object to call [**GetRecognizers**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208480) and retrieve the list of installed recognizers to populate the recognizer combo box.
trans-unit.target: Use this object to call [**GetRecognizers**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208480) and retrieve the list of installed recognizers to populate the recognizer combo box.

trans-unit.source: Update the handwriting recognizer if the recognizer combo box selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Update the handwriting recognizer if the recognizer combo box selection changes.

trans-unit.source: Use the [**InkRecognizerContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208479) to call [**SetDefaultRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh920328) based on the selected recognizer from the recognizer combo box.
trans-unit.target: Use the [**InkRecognizerContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208479) to call [**SetDefaultRecognizer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh920328) based on the selected recognizer from the recognizer combo box.

trans-unit.source: Finally, we perform the handwriting recognition based on the selected handwriting recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Finally, we perform the handwriting recognition based on the selected handwriting recognizer.

trans-unit.source: For this example, we use the click event handler of the "Recognize" button to perform the handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we use the click event handler of the "Recognize" button to perform the handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.
trans-unit.target: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.

trans-unit.source: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.
trans-unit.target: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.

trans-unit.source: The previous two examples require the user to press a button to start recognition.
trans-unit.target: The previous two examples require the user to press a button to start recognition.

trans-unit.source: Your app can also perform dynamic recognition using stroke input paired with a basic timing function.
trans-unit.target: Your app can also perform dynamic recognition using stroke input paired with a basic timing function.

trans-unit.source: For this example, we'll use the same UI and stroke settings as the previous international recognition example.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we'll use the same UI and stroke settings as the previous international recognition example.

trans-unit.source: Like the previous examples, the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)), and ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).
trans-unit.target: Like the previous examples, the [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) is configured to interpret input data from both pen and mouse as ink strokes ([**InputDeviceTypes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922019)), and ink strokes are rendered on the [**InkCanvas**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn858535) using the specified [**InkDrawingAttributes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms695050).

trans-unit.source: Instead of a button to initiate recognition, we add listeners for two [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stroke events ([**StrokesCollected**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922024) and [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702)), and set up a basic timer ([**DispatcherTimer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244250)) with a one second [**Tick**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244256) interval.
trans-unit.target: Instead of a button to initiate recognition, we add listeners for two [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stroke events ([**StrokesCollected**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn922024) and [**StrokeStarted**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn914702)), and set up a basic timer ([**DispatcherTimer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244250)) with a one second [**Tick**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244256) interval.

trans-unit.source: Here are the handlers for the three events we added in the first step.
trans-unit.target: Here are the handlers for the three events we added in the first step.

trans-unit.source: Start the recognition timer when the user stops inking by lifting their pen or finger, or releasing the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Start the recognition timer when the user stops inking by lifting their pen or finger, or releasing the mouse button.

trans-unit.source: After one second of no ink input, recognition is initiated.
trans-unit.target: After one second of no ink input, recognition is initiated.

trans-unit.source: If a new stroke starts before the next timer tick event, stop the timer as the new stroke is likely the continuation of a single handwriting entry.
trans-unit.target: If a new stroke starts before the next timer tick event, stop the timer as the new stroke is likely the continuation of a single handwriting entry.

trans-unit.source: Call the recognition function after one second of no ink input.
trans-unit.target: Call the recognition function after one second of no ink input.

trans-unit.source: Finally, we perform the handwriting recognition based on the selected handwriting recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Finally, we perform the handwriting recognition based on the selected handwriting recognizer.

trans-unit.source: For this example, we use the [**Tick**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244256) event handler of a [**DispatcherTimer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244250) to initiate the handwriting recognition.
trans-unit.target: For this example, we use the [**Tick**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244256) event handler of a [**DispatcherTimer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br244250) to initiate the handwriting recognition.

trans-unit.source: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.
trans-unit.target: An [**InkPresenter**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn899081) stores all ink strokes in an [**InkStrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208492) object.

trans-unit.source: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.
trans-unit.target: The strokes are exposed through the [**StrokeContainer**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/dn948766) property of the **InkPresenter** and retrieved using the [**GetStrokes**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208499) method.
